JOJO

News

February 14, 2022

JoJo Joins CW Series: 'All American'

See article from DEADLINE here.

JoJo, singer-songwriter, will be joining CW's 'All American' for a recurring role that is somewhat reminiscent of her real life. She will be starring as Sabine, who's a world famous recording artist who's been making music since she was 10 years old. JoJo will make her first appearance in the return episode for Season 4 on February 21.

December 26, 2021

JoJo Engaged to 'Saved By The Bell' Actor, Dexter Darden

See article from NJ here.

On December 20, 2021, JoJo said YES to 'Saved by the Bell' actor, Dexter Darden, when they were celebrating JoJo's 31st birthday at La Concha Resort in San Juan, Puerto Rico.

December 13, 2021

JoJo Performs for the 70th Miss Universe Pagent

See article from Interaksyon here.

At the 70th Miss Universe pagent in Eilat, Israel, JoJo performed some of her songs and her 2006 hit single, "To Little Too Late". She performed during the evening gown portion showcasing the Top 10 pagent contestants. Viewers who were watching from home and at the pagent felt nostalgia when she performed her "To Little Too Late" song.
